alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 11:25PM CST until January 04 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Fayette, Lamar, Marion and Pickens. * WHEN...Until 230 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1125 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winfield, Fayette, Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Guin, Berry, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Belk, Beaverton, Gu-Win, Ethelsville, Blooming Grove, Bluff, Ashcraft Corner, Lamar County Airport, Crews and Bedford.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
